member.name: T:Serenity.AIHub.Extensions.ServiceCollectionExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods for the IServiceCollection interface.

member.name: M:Serenity.AIHub.Extensions.ServiceCollectionExtensions.AddSerenityAIHub(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.Action{Serenity.AIHub.Models.SerenityAIHubOptions})
member.summary: Adds the Serenity AI Hub services to the specified IServiceCollection.
member.param: The IServiceCollection to add the services to.
An action that configures the Serenity AI Hub options.
member.returns: The IServiceCollection with the Serenity AI Hub services added.
